doc:
John Nolan (British actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Nolan_(British_actor) 0 John Nolan (born 22 May 1938) is a British film and television actor. He is known for his role as Wayne Enterprises board member Douglas Fredericks in Batman Begins, the Gotham Central promotional segments for The Dark Knight, and The Dark Knight Rises. Nolan had a recurring role in his nephew Jonathan Nolan's television series Person of Interest as John Greer, a mysterious British figure connected with Decima Technologies and the main villain from seasons three to five of the show. John_Nolan ( born 22_May_1938 ) is a_British_film_and_television_actor . He is_known for his_role as Wayne_Enterprises_board_member_Douglas_Fredericks in Batman_Begins , the_Gotham_Central_promotional_segments for The_Dark_Knight , and The_Dark_Knight_Rises . Nolan had a_recurring_role in his_nephew_Jonathan_Nolan 's_television_series_Person of Interest as John_Greer , a_mysterious_British_figure connected with Decima_Technologies and the_main_villain from seasons_three to five of the_show .
